00027 #ifndef LBANN_LAYER_FACTORY_HPP_INCLUDED
00028 #define LBANN_LAYER_FACTORY_HPP_INCLUDED
00029 
00030 #include "lbann/layers/lbann_layer.hpp"
00031 #include "lbann/lbann_base_factory.hpp"
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <type_traits>
00034 
00035 using namespace std;
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039 namespace lbann
00040 {
00045 class layer_factory: private base_factory<Layer>
00046 {
00047 
00048   private:
00049     typedef base_factory<Layer> layer_types;
00050 
00051   public:
00052     typedef typename layer_types::method_pointer layer_pointer;
00053     typedef typename layer_types::method_container layer_container;
00054 
00055 
00056     layer_factory(){}
00057 
00058 
00059     ~layer_factory(){}
00060 
00061 
00062     //Access methods
00063   template <class Derived, class... Args>
00064   Layer* create_layer(string layer_label, int layer_index, Args&&... args)
00065   {
00066     Layer* in_ptr = new Derived(layer_index, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
00067     layer_types::add_method(layer_label, layer_pointer(in_ptr),layer_index);
00068     return in_ptr;
00069   }
00070 
00071 
00072   layer_pointer get_layer(string layer_label,int layer_index=0)
00073   {
00074     layer_pointer lp = layer_types::get_method(layer_label,layer_index);
00075     if(lp.get() == NULL) {
00076       exit(-1);
00077     }
00078     return lp;
00079   }
00080 
00081   //void remove_layer(index)
00082 
00083   inline size_t size()
00084   {
00085     return layer_types::methods.size();
00086   }
00087 
00088   //Debug: Layers in my world
00089   void print() const
00090   {
00091     cout << "Layers in my World (label:index): " << endl;
00092       for(auto& i:layer_types::methods)
00093         cout << i.first.first << " " << i.first.second << endl;
00094       //it->second.print()
00095   }
00096 
00097 
00098 
00099 };//end layer_factory class
00100 
00101 
00102 }// end lbann namespace
00103 
00104 
00105 #endif // LBANN_LAYER_FACTORY_HPP_INCLUDED
